page.title: 13 Local Industries (1)
page.content: SPRINGTIME NURSERY This nursery is unusual in that it is one of only two in the country that grows{lettuces}by the process known as {hydroponics}which means that the plants are grown in water.This system of growing was developed at Littlehamton by Dr Cooper and was adopted at the nursery in 1978.The owners brother has a similar nursery in London.In all it has 4.5 acres under glass and produces 3 million plants a year in 8 crops,Summer and Winter.The whole operation is controlled by computer which analysis the water and adds the nutrients when necessary.In all the nursery employs six full time workers.The produce is sent to the distibution centre of International Stores for delivery to their supermarkets.
